pages.text: Vachonisia is around 7 cm-long marrellomorph from Devonian Hunsr√ºck Slate, Germany. It carries a roughly trapezoidal 'shield', which seems to have been rounded in juveniles. Alongside with Mimetaster, it was likely a bottom-feeder, but the shield shape shows that it is able to swim relatively well.
